body: let me summarize it, the twintail girl love to hoging all the member club and the blonde girl found it, an then they became a friend, the blonde girl ask twintail to join cosplaying to reduce her sexual urges, but when she start cosplaying she being raped by fatty senpai and get pregnant, she felt sad because she said would stop hoging and the blonde take revenge to fatty senpai. then the twintail know she being pregnant and don't know who the father because she hoging all member, so she apologize to all member and accept their sex request. at the end she live with blonde girl as lesbian couple and raise the child.
